SafeNavFront End & CSS Framework

Front End & Bootstrap CSS Framework

Mobile First Design

Web Accessible

Good design and clean coding

That is a Principle

SafeNav is an app demonstrating a basic product info site.

This is a mobile first design.

Tech used is HTML, CSS, JavaScrip, jQuery, and Bootstrap CSS Framework.
